website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive pellet-based formula is packed with vitamins, minerals, and a wide range of healthy fruit, vegetable, and meaty ingredients that combine for a complete sugar glider diet.
pros: Oat meal, porcine meal, and wheat are the first 3 ingredients
Shrimp and poultry are high-protein ingredients
Tasty honey, sweet potato, and cranberry ingredients
cons: Picky sugar gliders may not take to a pellet food at first, but give them time to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Killed my pets
customer_reviews.text: Thia product killed 2 of my gliders the other is sick and on sterioids. I have left messages with the company and no one has gotten back to me. I bought this product as a substitute as I wouldnt have time to make up a month supply of their food for a few days and I was running low on the last batch I made. After feeding them this product. One glider died the next day and the 2and glider died the day after. The 3rd glider wouldnt eat and wasnt active.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness it wasn't worse.
customer_reviews.text: Made my baby sick. He got real weak, could barely walk. We stopped giving him this food and started him on something else and he is slowly regaining his strength. We took him to the vet and that is exactly what Dr. told us to do. He blamed the diet. Thank goodness it wasn't worse. We also noticed his urine was smelling really bad. Within a few days of not eating this, his urine didn't smell at all. STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Must taste pretty good and seems to be a decent supplement.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this as a backup food source for going on three years now. My glider absolutely loves it... so I only place this food in his home, as a supplement, when I’m going to be away for awhile (such as overnight). If I were to leave this in there around the clock... he would likely overeat this product... and not eat a more of his balanced fresh diet. The only reason I docked a star was because it could have more of the veggie pieces (there’s very few pieces throughout the bag)... tho I’m not sure if they’re any more nutritionally sound than the pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Bowerbirdgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not an all in one diet for gliders.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, this is not use for a full diet so please don't think that. Feed sugar gliders properly. This is not to be used as the only thing to feed your glider. I have seen too many people put bad reviews on pellets for gliders. I think the miss understanding is why. If you have any questions or doubts please do your research ASGV.org is a good source and they will answer all of your questions about diet and how to properly care for your gliders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product pieces are very small
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were small I know they're supposed to be small for a glider but they're too small for them to grab it just seems I don't know different kind of food then I got them before I know they're supposed to grab it and hold on to it but this is not even big enough for them to hold I don't know the flavor of it I don't know what it taste like so I can't tell you that part but it's just like a lot of little Pebbles smaller than I guess the size of a pencil LED they are about the size of the tip of a ink pen
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE JONES

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper in other places but needed in a hurry
customer_reviews.text: We accepted a sugar glider at last minute ( we have many many exotic animals because we operate a rescue) this was our first sugar glider but we needed some high protein food in additional to fresh stuff and insects to get the little one back on track and healthy. He doesnt really seem to like it much so I guess thats a no on the flavor. He prefers fresh food. I did look at some other places online and there were more affordable options to this one but since I have prime and needed it fast I made the decision to purchase this one on that I could get it here the following day.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonnaLloydJR

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: First of all, while ordering this I was completely out of food (I know, total fur mom fail) after running to the store to make my little sugar glider some food for the next few days to hold him over.... this showed up SUPER FAST! I have been buying this product for my sugar gilder for the past 2 years and he loves it! He gets so excited for breakfast and dinner he will literally hug his bowl (it’s the cutest thing I have ever seen and makes my heart so happy)
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not terrible
customer_reviews.text: I feed this to my sugar gliders as their normal food. They're not crazy about it, but it is supposed to be nutritious. My major gripe about it is that most of it ends up snapping while they chew on it and it flies out of the cage. I'd get 5-10% of it ends up on my floor instead of in their bellies. Sometimes I'll mix in some baby food and it makes it a little more appetizing to them.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Carson

customer_reviews.title: Killed 2 of my gliders
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my sugar gliders for 6 years, this food killed two of them. I never read reviews, and I wished I had for this. So heartbreaking, they become paralyzed and have seizures.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: My Gliders Enjoy These Pellets
customer_reviews.text: My 3 gliders enjoy these pellets. They're small enough for them to hold, and I think it's been a nice addition to their diet. Of course this should never be used as a glider's only source of food. We have a small bowl of it sitting out along with their staples; fruit, veggies, & a protein. I gave this 4 stars since it's mainly pellets with a few chunks of dried fruit, and the chunks are generally too large for them to hold. I haven't tried other pellet brands so I am unable to compare them to like products.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Sugargliders eat it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I'm asked to review the flavor (I didn't eat it) or the sturdiness (does one really WANT their food to be "sturdy???"). I purchase this on auto-delivery for my son's two sugar gliders. They eat it. They don't love it as much as honey or plain yogurt, but it's obviously eaten in the morning so...it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice supplement for our gliders (along with fresh fruit/veggies)
customer_reviews.text: We use vitasmart to supplement our glider's diet of fruit and veggies. One teaspoon/ per glider daily. We've tried others and odors turned out to be an issue - this food seems to reduce their odors. The cost of the product is also one of the lower prices and we really appreciate this.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent mix but Good overall
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this brand for awhile now and feed it to my gliders in addition to their liquid food and fruits/veggies. They seem to like it well enough, but the consistency of the product is a bit off. One bag will be filled with mango chunks and the next will have literally none. A more recent bag had a ton of some kind of seeds and I'd never noticed any in the first batch I'd ordered. But that's really the only draw back, for the price, the quality is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Terrible/Deadly
customer_reviews.text: This item killed my Sugar Glider (DO NOT PURCHASE!!) I purchased this food and immediately after eating my babies got extremely ill and passed away the very next day. DO NOT PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.author: Keenan R

customer_reviews.title: Feed sugars BML diet use as a filler not staple diet
customer_reviews.text: My sugar gliders will eat it but mostly the snacks thought the bag. Do your research feed them BML diet I use this just as something they can snack on if they wake up hungry during the day
customer_reviews.author: J.Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: My Suggies Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My gliders get this mixed with something else during the day. They love it. If you want to use this as a stable diet that works well too. I just wanted mine to have a healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: Auditty

customer_reviews.text: My sugar-babies dont really eat this but that doesn't mean it's not good. I would lf liked a more dry fruit in it. There are very few pieces of the dry fruit so thats why I give it a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: My sugar gliders love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to bag of food for my sugar gliders for the past 2 years. My sugar gliders love this stuff and the price is really good compared to others whereas the sugar gliders I have wouldn't eat. The only negative is sometimes when the bag is shipped some of the food is crushed into dust. I don't think that's worth taking off a star though as that could honestly be a shipping issue.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My gliders don't enjoy this as much as other chow we have used. Always left in their bowl the next morning :( They don't go for it like the other kinds. Not sure why. Not sure I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue E. Wetterlin

customer_reviews.title: Did not eat
customer_reviews.text: After feeding to our sugar gliders we noticed they would not eat. They threw the food all out the food bowl and would not eat
customer_reviews.author: Dino Killer

customer_reviews.title: Gliders love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have two gliders and they eat mixed veggies, fruit, and a couple of times a week as a treat they get yogurt bites. We give them with every meal, a tablespoon of Vitakraft Vitasmart, the gliders must love it, because they never leave any.
customer_reviews.author: bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Jefferey hates it
customer_reviews.text: Hubs said his sugar glider didn't like. Otherwise it came in perfect condition and I am sure it is good just not for my hubs picky glider.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Castro

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality food
customer_reviews.text: My sugar glider seemed to like it but after doing research I realized it’s not a good quality food to feed them.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Craven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for subscription!
customer_reviews.text: My gliders love this food. I serve it daily along with their fresh fruit and meal worms. The subscription process an automatic delivery makes it very convenient and the price is better than at local pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: melirdec

customer_reviews.title: One more vote for "my Sugar Gliders Hate this stuff"
customer_reviews.text: One more vote for "my Sugar Gliders Hate this stuff". I have Five gliders and none of them will go near this stuff. They like Exotic Nutrition Complete and LOVE Pocket Pets Glide-r-Chow berry formula. Oh well, live and learn. Maybe my cats will eat it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: My gliders like it now.
customer_reviews.text: I grind it up and add it to my gliders staple diet; otherwise they don't care for it. I make ice cubes of food for them and they would literally lick and pick the food from around these pellets, leaving a pile of them behind every morning if I didn't grind them up!
customer_reviews.author: mandican

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My sugar glider ate this with no problems. It's a little costly but not the most expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Casalenuovo

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My sugar glider loves this food. I’ve tried others, but this is his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Scozzari-Kilbourn

customer_reviews.title: good value and picky eaters eat this
customer_reviews.text: There are not a lot of this type of food for gliders. Mine are picky and they love these.
customer_reviews.author: Howshmmm

customer_reviews.title: Not for my glider
customer_reviews.text: My glider ran from this stuff little one is picky what she eats
customer_reviews.author: Wanda vanBoesschoten

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: The price and the amount that you get are very reasonable. My glider just doesn't like it. She will barely touch it. Onward to find something else to add to her plates.
customer_reviews.author: Geekfamily2008

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they taste good but my sugar gliders love them
customer_reviews.author: CD Harden

customer_reviews.title: My sugar gliders hate it. :(
customer_reviews.text: My sugar gliders hate this food. They won’t even touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Your Glider will LOVE THIS FOOD
customer_reviews.text: We have a picky fellow. He's Australian-bred and is very finicky about his treats and staple food. This food was recommended as one that is more like a natural diet for gliders and it couldn't be more far from the truth. If we deviate from this good tot EY something else, he throws it like a bad meal in a French restaurant. Bring it back as he is all happy again. Try it and you will be loved by your glider forever!
customer_reviews.author: RenoReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Glider food
customer_reviews.text: Cant say how flavor was as I don't eat them, but my gliders love it.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Mu suggies love these, they’ve gained some weight, which it’s why I wanted this on the first place. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Finally something they like
customer_reviews.text: My little guys love this food. They wouldn't eat much before, I tried everything and this food they actually eat all of what we put in the food container.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: My gliders do NOT like it
customer_reviews.text: I decided to save a few dollars and try this, and my gliders hate it so I wasted my money. Buy the good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Sugar gliders love it
customer_reviews.text: My sugar gliders can be picky and they love this food
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Oles

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our sugar gliders LOVE this food. We ordered it here on Amazon because it was such a great price. It has small chunks of what I am guessing are papaya, and the gliders are constantly fighting over who gets to eat what. The resealable bag works great, and keeps everything fresh. We will definitely continue to buy and recommend it in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Starlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome choice for sugar gliders
customer_reviews.text: My sugar gliders love this and I am so happy with the ingredients too.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy animal lady from Mi.

customer_reviews.title: Not The Same
customer_reviews.text: It’s not exactly the same as you’d get from Chewy; my gliders eat it but not as well as the other. This is lacking the vegetables that are usually in pet store food.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My sugar glider loves this! Of course I always add a fruit or veggie with it but he tears his pellets up! Of course they are kinda messy so I don’t give him a whole lot, but he does get them daily. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was just what I ordered. The gliders don't like it but that isn't the manufacturer's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of four

customer_reviews.title: Yumminess
customer_reviews.text: These are small pellets easy for the sugargliders to eat. They seem to really like them. Thry clean their plate. I had to hide them bc my cats loved them too.
customer_reviews.author: Becky B

customer_reviews.title: Eat food for sugar glider
customer_reviews.text: Great food for sugar glider. Can’t find sugar glider food anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Haas

customer_reviews.title: My Sugar glider LOVES this food
customer_reviews.text: I have had my sugar glider for years now and have tried several brands- this has been the only brand he has eaten!
customer_reviews.author: Angela O

customer_reviews.title: Gliders hated it
customer_reviews.text: Gliders absolutely hated it. Tried to mix with fruit, tried to hide it elsewhere, they would absolutely eat around it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to buy from amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Our two sugar gliders really enjoy this food. Easier to buy here than find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Constipated My Gliders
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these because they're so inexpensive, but unfortunately they constipated my sugar gliders. :(
customer_reviews.author: S.Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Ya gotta feed the little critters something
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't eat this stuff so I couldn't tell you if it were any good, but my Sugar Gliders eat it so it can't be that bad, right?
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They seem to like it enough and so far it's the most economical I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Onetreasure

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to rate flavor. :-) Our sugar glider eats it, so I guess it's a 5. Cheaper to buy online than in the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: maryo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Gliders and Happy Human
customer_reviews.text: I fully expected my gliders to hate this stuff. Honestly it does not look or smell even remotely appetizing but apparently my little guys love it so I'm happy with it too.
customer_reviews.author: KBarroso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sugar gliders!
customer_reviews.text: These are great pellets for my sugar babies. And it only takes 2 days to get here. Best deal ever I continue to buy from them because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyluck_478

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: It not the best for sugar gliders, but it was cheap and convinent. There is other pellet staple food out there that are better for them. Make sure you know this isn't a substitute for fresh veggies and fruit! I love this staple food especially when I have a very hungry glider that want to eat during the day.
customer_reviews.author: GreatOwl

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My tiny sugarbear has not complained so I will conclude it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for our sugar glider. We will probably order again. Just looking for a good price for something good for out sugar glider.
customer_reviews.author: Cory S

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipment!
customer_reviews.text: I like this food for a staple for the gliders.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn E. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Good value for sugar glider food
customer_reviews.text: The critter eats it well. I use this as the base diet with lots of extras. Extruded is supposed to be better for the pets so that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: T Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Suggies avoid this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My suggies avoid these pellets like they're polio. Even when mixed with yogurt or honey they lick around them then spit them out. You can take the risk and buy, maybe yours will like them -__-
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hamze

customer_reviews.title: My Suggies love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the food my sugar gliders keep eating. They get fresh every night but eat this as a staple. Will keep ordering, :)
customer_reviews.author: N. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Sugar glider food
customer_reviews.text: My gliders love this. They’re very picky and I’ve tried many different dry foods. This is the only one they enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Little Ripple

customer_reviews.title: There iffy on it.
customer_reviews.text: But that's because my sugar gliders are spoiled and don't like dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: they love
customer_reviews.text: ive tried 2 kinds with my group this one they love!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica/donny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our sugar glider loves this. He can't get enough. Perfect and no hunting for it in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Ranjo327

customer_reviews.title: Gotta recommend
customer_reviews.text: Since the critters are healthy and happy, I have to recommend. Maybe a little pricey for what it is, but I can't buy this at the local pet store so I will keep getting it from here.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My gliders love this food, I've yet to find anything better in any local pet shop
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Miller

customer_reviews.title: My Boys Like this Food
customer_reviews.text: I have two gliders, and while this isn't their absolute favorite food, it is a good food for the price. It has a good amount of protein and other nutrients essential for healthy gliders, and is in a small pellet form that's easy for them to hold. I would just make sure to feed a variety of fruits and veggies with it to maintain a healthy diet, but that's typical of any glider food.
customer_reviews.author: Starchelle

customer_reviews.title: not the best diet, but convenient.
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok diet, but there are much healthier options for gliders on the market. When i used this I would mix it with different types of baby food, but now that I've switched mine to the HPW diet their coat looks much healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My sugar gliders love this food. Have ordered 3 bags of food now, and they still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Sugar glider snack
customer_reviews.text: My sugar glider loves these as a snack. The smaller size of the drop itself is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: great choice of food
customer_reviews.text: My sugar gliders love this food! They always go crazy for the dried fruit chunks in it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very great product. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sugar glider and he loves it. Since I have added this to his diet he has been having healthier looking bowel movements and it has been helping with his sugar glider odor.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: She’s dead now
customer_reviews.text: We changed to this food for our Marci 2 days ago and now she’s dead. I’m heartbroken

customer_reviews.text: The food was all powdery instead of being pellets. Not sure if it was old or crushed. First time this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping and my little sugar gliders love it! I mix it with other stuff they ...

customer_reviews.title: Pet food... I don't know how to rate this
customer_reviews.text: My friend's Sugar Rat loves this food. He enjoys it as much as the apples he keeps leaving all over my house and room...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Suggie boys love this dry food, they actually eat it instead of slinging it out of the bowl.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My babies like it!. I give them alittle with their main food source. Will continue to buy!

customer_reviews.text: Great food for my pets. I will definitely order again.

customer_reviews.text: The suggies love this food. We feed it along with fruits and vegetables and mealworms. We also provide vitamin supplement. They really like having this in the cage for a snack between meals.

customer_reviews.text: I keep a small bowl of these pellets in the cage all of the time and also feed fresh fruits and veggies daily

customer_reviews.text: I love this product so far. gave it to two sugar gliders that were just to eat only apples and fruit and they just love it. I will be buying more for sure.

product_meta.title: Vitakraft Vitasmart Sugar Glider Food - High Protein Formula, 28 Ounce
product_meta.description: Specially-formulated, high protein Vitakraft VitaSmart Sugar Glider Food includes a mix of vegetables (such as carrots and parsley), five different fruit juices (mango, kiwi, cherry, apple, and apricot), freeze dried mealworms, and a touch of honey. This formula contains a wide variety of unique ingredients to create a pellet that your pet will find tasty and a healthy start to a balanced diet.
feature_bullets: Specially Fortified With Vitamins And Minerals.
Includes Flax Meal, Honey And Garden Vegetables.
Contains Mango, Kiwi, Cherry, Apple And Apricot Juices That Your Sugar Glider Will Find Tastes Great.
